Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Apartamentos Roc Portonova in Calvia (Palmanova), you'll be minutes from Golf Fantasia and close to Palma Nova Beach. This beach apartment is within close proximity of Marineland Mallorca and Puerto Portals Marina.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 71 guestrooms, featuring kitchenettes with full-sized refrigerators/freezers and microwaves. Rooms have private balconies. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and separate sitting areas.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy recreational amenities such as an outdoor pool and an indoor pool. This apartment also features wireless Internet access (surcharge), an arcade/game room, and tour/ticket assistance. Getting to nearby attractions is a breeze with the area shuttle (surcharge).

Dining
You can enjoy a meal at a restaurant serving the guests of Apartamentos Roc Portonova, or find a snack in a coffee shop/café. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar. Breakfast is available for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, multilingual staff, and laundry facilities. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
